import {Button, Container, Modal, Nav, Navbar as NavbarBs} from "react-bootstrap"; import {NavLink, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import {useContext,useState} from "react"; import AuthContext from "./authentication/AuthProvider"; import useLogout from "./authentication/useLogout"; export const Navbar = () => { const {auth} = useContext(AuthContext); const logout = useLogout(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const signOut = async () =>{ debugger await logout(); navigate('/login') } if (auth.role === "Admin") { return (
| Books Authors Categories Users Are you sure you want to sign out?
) } return (
Library App
Are you sure you want to sign out? ) }
